name: Alex Morgan
persona: Alex Morgan is a 21-year-old Business Administration major with a CGPA of 2.62. While Alex is motivated to improve academically and shows moderate perseverance, he sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety. He sets reasonable achievement goals but can find it challenging to consistently regulate his effort, especially under pressure. Alex is determined to graduate and is seeking strategies to boost his confidence and study habits for better academic performance.
